about_the_game:
• Enter a beautiful and mysterious world filled with dangerous challenges, mind-bending puzzles and scary jump scares. Game Title combines deep combat and exploration for a Soulslike experience with exciting environmental puzzles, creating a tense and immersive atmosphere.

    As you travel the Lost Isle , you will uncover secrets, battle relentless enemies and solve intricate puzzles that stand between you and the truth. Danger lurks around every corner and scary jump scares keep you on edge.

    Prepare yourself to face a cursed world where your intelligence, reflexes and courage will be tested to the limit. Can the cursed island swallow you?

.Gameplay Features:

  • Third-person, Action Adventure  

  • Combat in The Lost Island is simple to learn

  • you’ll need to explore the balance between attacking and avoiding damage, and perfect your timing to take advantage of your opponents’ weaknesses.

  • At the beginning of the game you have all the weapons you can use in the game 

  • Clever Puzzles: Enjoy a variety of puzzles that gradually increase in complexity, offering a satisfying challenge for all skill levels.

  • This game contains jumpscares. Be prepared for unexpected moments that will keep you on the edge of your seat. If you're sensitive to sudden loud noises, please proceed with caution.

    What is the story behind Lost Island ?

  • In the bustling ports of a vast island, merchants from across the seas gathered to trade goods, share stories and swap news. One story that captured their imagination was the story of the Lost Island, a mysterious land. It is said that the Lost Island The tribes that were once at the peak of their power were famous for their unique customs and knowledge. But these tribes were united by one formidable element: a plant with fantastic powers. As beautiful as this plant was to behold, it was rumoured to possess dark, hidden powers that wreaked havoc on those who encountered it.

  • Tales spread far and wide, finally reaching the ears of the king. Intrigued and worried by the rumours, the king summoned his most trusted advisers to reveal the truth behind the lost island and its cursed plant. He hoped to find a way to discover the danger and perhaps unlock the secret of the plant's powers for the benefit of his kingdom.

name: The Lost Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4GB available space GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: ntel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4GB available space MB available space

short_description: A lonely warrior to find a plant, that has caused the extinction of the tribes.
